title: The FHSA
description: The best way to save for your first home in Canada.

content.title: The Best of Both Worlds
content.text: The First Home Savings Account (FHSA) gives you a tax deduction when you contribute (like an RRSP) and tax-free withdrawals when you buy a home (like a TFSA).

quiz.question: What is the lifetime contribution limit for an FHSA?
quiz.explanation: The FHSA allows you to contribute up to $8,000 per year, with a lifetime limit of $40,000.
